name: Color Cube 3D
description:
Play with the cube until each face consists of a single distinct color.

FEATURES
- Play with any size of cube you want: from 2x2x2 to 20x20x20 (now includes 50x50x50 and 100x100x100)!
- Simple user interface, simple controls, easy-to-navigate camera mechanism
- Undo & redo support (for up to 100 moves)
- Easy and Normal difficulties
- Cube customization (colors & edges)
- Fully customizable user interface
- Two different camera navigation modes: Restricted for easy navigation & Free for navigation in all directions with no restriction
